get_state: select id, name, valid_id from ticket_state;
get_services: select a.id as service_id, a.name as service_name,c.id as sla_id,c.name as sla_name ,first_response_time, update_time, solution_time, a.valid_id from service as a join service_sla as b on a.id = b.service_id join sla c on c.id = b.sla_id ;
get_priority: select id, name, valid_id from ticket_priority;
get_type: select id, name, valid_id from ticket_type;
get_users: SELECT id AS UserID, login AS UserLogin, first_name, last_name , valid_id FROM users;
